name: One more chance (Pat_Ian)
description:
How much would you give to see your loved one again? Would you go through hell? Or maybe just limbo?

You and your wife are having a nice day when suddenly Richard "Dick, the grand wizard of Bone'emheim" ambushes you. He kills you and kidnaps your wife.  You're given the opportunity to come back to life, but only if you manage to collect the three orbs of life.

Creator note:

I started learning game development 4 weeks ago, and for some reason I thought it was a good idea to join a gamejam. This is my first solo project without any toturials, so forgive me if there are some gamebreaking bugs, and the sound is off, and the assets doesn't look optimal, etc.

I mainly wanted to focus on trying new things and proving to myself that I could do it if I set myself a goal.

Anyway, thanks for checking out my game. I know there's a lot missing but as you yourself might know, we have limited time to reach all our goals.
